column1: Little Goat Diner////We both got the Little Piggy went to China dish
column2: which was mind-blowing. The pork sausage on the biscuit was incredibly well-seasoned. You could taste the lemongrass and ginger throughout and the mala (numbing) Szechuan pepper came through nicely at the end and was surprisingly not too spicy! The gooseberries also gave the dish a nice citrusy touch. The dish did
column4: get saltier as you ate it.
